answers.answer: You shouldn't take it when your pregnant at all.
It can cause high blood pressure.
It's safe, but idk if you have gd
Ok thanks. do you know of anything else i could take then. i have a horrible cold.

tylenol is safe to take during pregnancy however im not sure about with gd. if u have a nasty cold try taking orignal sudafed nothing added to it and also robetesien dm. both are what my Dr. had me take for mine a few weeks back. and they helped me.

question: I'm 33+5 and my doctor told me i could take it but i was reading on the back and it said not to take if you have diabetes. well i have gestational so is it safe to take or no?
title: tylenol cold,safe to take?
